00010 import os, re, types, sys, string, shutil, stat, glob
00011 
00012 def build_la_file(target, source, env):
00013         """ Writes a .la file, used by libtool """
00014         dest=open(target[0].path, 'w')
00015         sname=source[0].name
00016         dest.write("# Generated by ltmain.sh - GNU libtool 1.5.18 - (pwn3d by bksys)\n#\n#\n")
00017         if len(env['BKSYS_VNUM'])>0:
00018                 vnum=env['BKSYS_VNUM']
00019                 nums=vnum.split('.')
00020                 src=source[0].name
00021                 name = src.split('so.')[0] + 'so'
00022                 strn = src+" "+name+"."+str(nums[0])+" "+name
00023                 dest.write("dlname='%s'\n" % (name+'.'+str(nums[0])) )
00024                 dest.write("library_names='%s'\n" % (strn) )
00025         else:
00026                 dest.write("dlname='%s'\n" % sname)
00027                 dest.write("library_names='%s %s %s'\n" % (sname, sname, sname) )
00028         dest.write("old_library=''\ndependency_libs=''\ncurrent=0\n")
00029         dest.write("age=0\nrevision=0\ninstalled=yes\nshouldnotlink=no\n")
00030         dest.write("dlopen=''\ndlpreopen=''\n")
00031         dest.write("libdir='%s'" % env['BKSYS_DESTDIR'])
00032         dest.close()
00033         #return 0
00034 
00035 def read_la_file(target, source, env):
00036         """ Writes a .la file, used by libtool """
00037         values = {}
00038         src=open(target[0], 'r')
00039         list = src.readlines()
00040         for line in list:
00041                 a = line.replace('\n','')
00042                 if a[:1] == '#':
00043                         continue
00044                 var = a.split('=')
00045                 values[str(var[0])] = var[1].replace("'",'')
00046         return values
